Name: Umbraco backup database restore tool available

Content.summary: 'Umbraco backup database restore tool available' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about XML, Technology Internet, Business Finance written on 10 August 2006
Content.bodyText:
The Umbraco backup database restore tool for XML mode backups is now available for download.

Please read the user manual carefully before using this tool to restore an Umbraco database.
